price: 70. Tohuk lakat diggah tet (gira kinnuk) culim kee tet cararow kah yaguude mara keenik nanu naaxige.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
